short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best trade tracker for your chrome new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's easier than ever to become complacent and lose track of your account performance. That's why we deemed it necessary to build something to solve this problem. 

With this app, you will gain an in-depth understanding of your strengths and weaknesses as a trader. Track all crypto trades in your new-tab window. See the charts for the top 300 cryptos and place paper orders through the new-tab or the popup. 

Support for real orders is coming. First, we need to establish, with certainty, that we have achieved product-market-fit - then we will build out the remaining features. This app is built leveraging coinGecko and Messari APIs - with live price feeds and no-noise charts. 

You've probably heard of us thanks to our exclusive 'trade-snapshot' feature. Whereby, you can see the charts of all your previous trades whilst the trade was open. Yep. The most useful and potentially profitable feature on the market, offered by a free trader's tool.

We appreciate all feedback - since this is going to be a free product for at least the first 3 months, we request that you please leave reviews and messages on our twitter page. Bug finders will be rewarded!

Experience technical analysis the way the pro's do - without needing to go to an external website. Trade Tracker opens every time you open a new tab! Find out more on our website. Become the best you can be with our proprietary account performance indicators - built for traders, by traders. The best way to track your performance in today's markets. Due to currently being in beta-testing, we are set to CAP THIS RELEASE TO 100 USERS until early 2023 when we will release the alpha.
